intent_atoms.description: Provide CLI commands to export parse trees as JSON or binary capture files via ISOInspectorCLI.
The CLI must support subcommands `export-json` and `export-capture` with deterministic exporters.
Output validation and streaming integration must correctly feed ParseTreeBuilder, JSONParseTreeExporter, and ParseEventCaptureEncoder.
Help output, default destination derivation, exporter round-tripping, and capture decoding are covered by tests.
Export commands must surface failures via stderr and maintain consistent success/error messaging.
CLI argument parsing, output validation, streaming integration, and test coverage were added to support the new export functionality.

functional_units.name: export-json CLI subcommand
functional_units.description: Exports parse trees to deterministic JSON files via ISOInspectorCLI

functional_units.name: export-capture CLI subcommand
functional_units.description: Captures and exports parse events in binary format via ISOInspectorCLI

functional_units.name: ParseTreeBuilder integration
functional_units.description: Builds parse trees from streamed input for export commands

functional_units.name: JSONParseTreeExporter component
functional_units.description: Converts parse trees into JSON output
